title: Strengthening Teaching Practice Competencies: Instructor Capacity-Building Course for Emergency Transition to Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design synchronous/asynchronous classes within a week using major remote education platforms such as Zoom and Google Classroom.
Learners can apply online-appropriate teaching methods, such as flipped learning and cooperative learning, to real classroom scenarios.
Learners can design summative assessments using digital evaluation tools (e.g., Kahoot, Google Forms) that promote learner engagement.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
